name: FAREWELL SHOW TICKETS
description:
We've managed to get our hands on a small intimate venue in a Warehouse within walking Distance from Birmingham City Centre. It's the perfect venue and we couldn't think of a better place to bring the last 5 years to a close with some of our best friends. 

The show will have a 9:30 curfew so those coming to the show from out of town can travel back at a reasonable time.

For cheap travel check out:
www.thetrainline.com
www.megabus.co.uk

Odessa (8:20 - 9:00)
www.facebook.com/ukodessa

Demoraliser (7:50-8:10)
www.facebook.com/demoraliser

Continents (7:10-7:40)
www.facebook.com/continentsband

Despite My Deepest Fear (6:30 - 7:00)
www.facebook.com/dmdfuk

For directions from Birmingham New Street check here - https://maps.google.co.uk/maps?saddr=Birmingham+New+Street,+Birmingham&daddr=Unit+2+Lower+Trinity+Street,+B9+4AG+Birmingham,+United+Kingdom&hl=en&ll=52.474743,-1.897953&spn=0.007541,0.019248&sll=52.474233,-1.896772&sspn=0.007542,0.019248&geocode=FWK_IAMdiAjj_yGYdodFB4kt1SkNqfpoibxwSDGYdodFB4kt1Q%3BFdOnIAMd-xPj_yH8y-aJIl_bzyk_rPlbYrxwSDH8y-aJIl_bzw&oq=new+street&dirflg=w&mra=ltm&t=m&z=16
